LanguageData.USAC_MICLIC_Towed.label: towed mineclearing line
LanguageData.USAC_MICLIC_Towed.description: Launch a rocket that tows a continuous demolition cable behind it. Upon impact, the cable detonates along its entire path to clear mines.
LanguageData.USAC_MineclearingShovel.label: mineclearing shovel
LanguageData.USAC_MineclearingShovel.description: The mech dashes forward to the target location and releases two powerful fan-shaped explosions along the path to clear mines and obstacles.
